text:
<https://dflate.io/state-of-tofu|Coding like we left the stone age>

<https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=watware.tofu-vscode|An experiment in fluid structured editing for JavaScript and TypeScript>

:bird::thread: <https://twitter.com/watware/status/1607026712755458055|Tofu is now a VSCode extension which makes your keystrokes more meaningful while keeping their original intent. Your code is formatted after every change>

elements.text: Coding like we left the stone age
An experiment in fluid structured editing for JavaScript and TypeScript
Tofu is now a VSCode extension which makes your keystrokes more meaningful while keeping their original intent. Your code is formatted after every change

attachments.fallback: Coding like we left the stone age
attachments.text: It has been three-ish years since I last uttered public musings (5 years since I longformed) about how we can unstuck ourselves from the textual coding pit we find ourselves in. And it has not been…
